title.native: 100万の命の上に俺は立っている
title.romaji: 100-man no Inochi no Ue ni Ore wa Tatteiru
title.english: I'm Standing on a Million Lives

description:
Aloof and logical middle school third-year Yuusuke Yotsuya is transported to a game-like alternate world. He becomes a third player and takes on a dangerous quest with his classmates Iu Shindo and Kusue Hakozaki, who were transported there earlier. The cold Yuusuke eschews emotionalism and examines all elements with detachment, sometimes even toying with the lives of his companions. Can he protect his party from attacking monsters, difficult incidents, and powerful scheming enemies and win the game?

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: ข้าก้าวผ่าน 1 ล้านชีวิตเพื่อพิชิตเกมมรณะ

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Survival
tags.description: Centers around the struggle to live in spite of extreme obstacles.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Death Game
tags.description: Features characters participating in a game, where failure results in death.

tags.name: Alternate Universe
tags.description: Features multiple alternate universes in the same series.

tags.name: Otaku Culture
tags.description: Centers around the culture of a fanatical fan-base.

tags.name: Philosophy
tags.description: Relating or devoted to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Goblin
tags.description: A goblin is a monstrous creature from European folklore. They are almost always small and grotesque, mischievous or outright malicious, and greedy. Sometimes with magical abilities.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Chuunibyou
tags.description: Prominently features a character with "Middle School 2nd Year Syndrome", who either acts like a know-it-all adult or falsely believes they have special powers.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Suicide
tags.description: The act or an instance of taking or attempting to take one's own life voluntarily and intentionally.

tags.name: Vore
tags.description: Features a character being swallowed or swallowing another creature whole.

tags.name: Body Horror
tags.description: Features characters who undergo horrific transformations or disfigurement, often to their own detriment.
